jathika rupawahiniya ha swadhina rupawahini aayathana nawikaranaya kirimata awashya dijital thakshanaya athulu thakshanika sampath ha danuma japan rajaya yatathe labadimata ekangathwaya pala kara atha.japanayen pirinamu thyagayak lesa rupawahiniya shri lankawata handunwa dun sema, nawina lokayata galapena lesa rupawahiniya pawathwa gena yama sandaha nawina thakshanaya handunwadimath sidu kala yuthu bawa shri lankawe wesena japan thanapathi kiyuniyo thakashi mahatha prakasha kara atha.prawruththi ha janamadhya amathi keheliya rambaulwalla mahatha saha japana thanapathiwaraya athara eeye (1) janamadhya amathyanshaye pawathi sakachchawakadi thakashi mahatha me ekangathawa pala kara atha.lokaye sama ratakama pahe rupawahini madhya idiriyen sitina bawath ema mattamata galapena lesa shri lankawe rupawahini madhya sakas wiya yuthu bawath thakashi mahatha prakasha kota atha.
